attributes.action: Ban HGV's from using the third lane on motorways/dual carriageways of 3 lanes or more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All users of motorways/dual carriageways in the UK have spent hours driving slowly behind HGV's blocking an entire carriageway. Where there is a third lane, HGV's should be restricted to the left 2 lanes to allow cars etc to pass.
